title: Vladimir Putin poses on rocky hilltop as he celebrates 67th birthday in forest
text:

Vladimir Putin posed on a rocky hilltop as he took his annual hike through the Siberian mountains ahead of his birthday.

The Russian president turned 67 today and was reportedly joined by some of his top officials including his Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu for a period of rest and relaxation, Russia Beyond reports.

Putin was pictured climbing the hills with a hiking pole in the vast Taiga forest.

Another photo shows him crouched down among some trees.

The president appeared well equipped with khaki hiking gear and a hat.

Putin is renowned for his adventures and was pictured topless on horseback in 2009, according to the Daily Mail.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Anadolu Agency via Getty Images)

This time, he and Shoigu were said to have made a camp fire and ate while looking out onto the Yenisei River.

He reportedly enjoyed searching for mushrooms and berries as he took in the sights with a pair of binoculars.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Anadolu Agency via Getty Images)

They are believed to have climbed up to 6,500 ft.

Putin's spokesman said the president was going to spend his birthday "in the great outdoors with his family and close friends," local reports said.
description: Photos show the Russian president amid the trees of the vast Taiga forest as he was reportedly joined by some of his top officials
